SVO_relationships.subject: He
SVO_relationships.object: telling stories about his travels

SVO_relationships.subject: her bright, Moorish eyes
SVO_relationships.object: wide with fear and surprise

SVO_relationships.subject: the boy
SVO_relationships.object: himself wishing that the day would never end

SVO_relationships.subject: her father
SVO_relationships.object: busy and keep him waiting for three days

SVO_relationships.subject: he
SVO_relationships.object: that he was feeling something he had never experienced before

SVO_relationships.subject: the desire
SVO_relationships.object: to live in one place forever
